seo.title: Interactive WCAG/RGAA Quiz with Gemini and Jina
seo.description: Test your knowledge of web accessibility guidelines (WCAG/RGAA) with this dynamic quiz. This project uses Vue.js 3, Google's Gemini API for question generation, and Jina Reader for content analysis.

common.change_immidiate: The language change is applied immediately
common.language_changed_announcement: The page is now in English

concept.title: Welcome to our intelligent quiz generator!
concept.main: For a quiz perfectly tailored to an article or document, simply provide its URL. When you do, we use the Jina AI API (jina.ai/reader) to analyze its content. Then, our AI, Google Gemini (ai.google.dev), creates questions based exclusively on that information for maximum relevance. If you leave the URL field empty, or if the address is inaccessible, no worries! Google Gemini automatically switches to its own knowledge base to generate a high-quality quiz on the requested topic.
